template.name: config-ontest
template.content:
p.db.jdbc.driver=com.mysql.jdbc.Driver p.db.jdbc.url=${"$"}{jdbcUrl} p.db.jdbc.username=${"$"}{jdbcUsername} p.db.jdbc.password=${"$"}{jdbcPassword} p.db.ds.query= SELECT 'x' p.db.ds.initialSize=1 p.db.ds.minIdle=1 p.db.ds.maxActive=5 p.db.ds.maxWait=60000 p.db.ds.timeBetweenEvictionRunsMillis=60000 p.db.ds.minEvictableIdleTimeMillis=300000
p.log.level=DEBUG
p.zk.address=127.0.0.1:2181
